headline: Keefe Bruyette Lowers Firm’s PT on Block (XYZ) Stock
summary: Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) is one of the Best Fundamental Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On January 2, Keefe Bruyette reduced the firm’s price target on Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ)’s stock to $85 from $90, while keeping an “Outperform” rating, as reported by The Fly. Notably, the firm adjusted its price targets in the broader consumer finance and payments groups. In a […]
